meta_info.name: EVENT
meta_info.description: Defines the abstract notion of a single event in a series. This class is generic, allowing types to be generated which are locked to particular spatial types, such as `EVENT<ITEM_LIST>`. Subtypes express point or intveral data.

functions.name: offset
functions.meaning: Offset of this event from origin, computed as time.diff(parent.origin).

attributes.name: time
attributes.description: Time of this event. If the width is non-zero, it is the time point of the trailing edge of the event.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Optional state data for this event.
